header_text: It is wedding season, and you are super excited to go to your friend's wedding. When you get there, you notice that most people have a date, but you don't have one. You remember how excited you are for your friend and have a great time celebrating.

elements.Text: Will you have fun at the wedding without a date?

elements.name: It is wedding season, and you are super excited to go to your friend's wedding. When you get there, you notice that most people have a date, but you don't have one.
